SlowTaskHandler Class Reference

This class will be called when a slow task is started or ended. More...

static void handler (SlowTaskHandler *sth)

Detailed Description

This class will be called when a slow task is started or ended.

Classes that want to be notified when a long task is being processed should inherit from this class.
